snippet: The university was penalized for its dealings with a man identified by the N.C.A.A. as a recruiter for a sports agent.
abstract: NCAA hands down stiff penalties against Central Florida, banning it from the post season next year in football and basketball for its dealings with Ken Caldwell, a so-called runner for a sports agent.
lead_paragraph: The university was penalized for its dealings with a man identified by the N.C.A.A. as a recruiter for a sports agent.

headline.seo: Central Florida Banned From Postseason in 2 Sports
headline.main: Central Florida Banned From Postseason in 2 Sports
headline.print_headline: Central Florida Banned From Postseason in 2 Sports
